issue.title: [Java][Dataset] Enable CSV file format
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13569](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13569). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
CSV was already supported in C++ Dataset API. This is to enable the format in Java side.
